data.text:
We're thrilled to announce that Siavash Alamouti will deliver the keynote speech for the special session "ğ——ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—§ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜€: ğ—ªğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¹ ğ—§ğ—µğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ—•ğ—² ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—”ğ—½ğ—½ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğŸ²ğ—š?" on Wednesday, September 4th, from 14:10 - 15:50. ğŸ™ï¸ Siavash Alamouti, Executive Chairman of the Board at mimik, is renowned for his groundbreaking contributions to the wireless industry, including the invention of the Alamouti Code, which is embedded in billions of wireless devices worldwide. His illustrious career spans leadership roles at Wells Fargo, Vodafone, Intel, and more, where he pushed the boundaries of technology for the betterment of humanity. In 2022, Siavash was honored with the prestigious Marconi Prize for his contributions to global wireless accessibility. With over 20,000 citations and numerous industry awards, he continues to drive innovation in areas like OFDM/MIMO, 5G, and hybrid edge cloud computing. Join us and learn from one of the brightest minds in the field about the latest advancements in digital twin technology.
